==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{wt|Kaʻehu}} comes from ''ka'' meaning "the" and ''’ehu'' meaning "sea spray." a male and female given name in the {{w|Hawaiian language}}.
* ''Kaeho'' could also correspond to the Hawaiian legendary figure ''Kaeho Kumanawa''.
